name: Closing Circle
description: The Investment and M&A Social Network
overview:
The Investment and M&A Social Network

Closing Circle is an innovative, exclusive and international networking platform that brings together and connects Investment and M&A firms and professionals to facilitate dealmaking. It is a dedicated community for dealmakers that qualify as Investors, Financial Advisors, Lenders and Consultants and a powerful platform designed to expand the reach and increase the visibility of our members.

Who can join the Circle?

Direct Investors: Financial investors in companies Indirect Investors: Financial investors in third party funds Financial Advisors: M&A and financial advisory providers Lenders: Bank debt providers and other lending institutions Consultants: Due diligence and consulting service providers

Our objective:

Facilitate your connection with other dealmakers in the Investment and M&A marketplace to help you close deals
